channel.title: Tutorial on Scott Westover
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on Scott Westover

item.title: Phaser3 - Create a simple preloader
item.description: With the official release of Phaser 3 this week, and Phaser 2 games not working on Phaser 3, it would be a great time to start using Phaser 3. In this tutorial, I am going to show you how to make a simple preloader in Phaser 3. For this tutorial, we are going to keep things simple, and just put all of our code in our HTML file. To get started, we need to create an index.

item.title: Unity 2D Snake Tutorial Part 1
item.description: For this tutorial we are going to make a simple 2D snake game in Unity. If you are not familiar with the classic arcade game Snake, it is a game that was originally created in the 1970's, and it gained a lot of popularity when it was included on Nokia phones. The game itself has a few variants. For this tutorial, the main objective of the game is to eat as many apples as you can without running into the any of the walls, obstacles, or yourself.
